General.Name: Anhui Zhongding Sealing Parts Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Zhongding Sealing Parts Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells hydraulic and pneumatic seals, and non-tire rubber products in China. Anhui Zhongding Sealing Parts Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Ningguo, China.
General.Address: Economic & Technical Development Zone, Ningguo, China
